SELECT A.RQSTNO, A.AUC_USER_NO, A.AUC_USER_NAME, A.AUC_DEPT_NO, A.AUC_DEPT_NAME, A.AUC_COMP_DT, A.REASON, B.RQST_REGTIME, B.RQST_USER_NO, B.RQST_USER_NAME, B.RQST_DEPT_NO, B.RQST_DEPT_NAME, B.RQST_ASSET_CNT, B.RQST_STATUS_CD, FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM008', B.RQST_STATUS_CD) RQST_STATUS_NAME, B.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, B.FRST_REGISTER_ID, B.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, B.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, concat(B.RQST_DEPT_NAME , ' / ' , B.RQST_USER_NAME) RQST_USER, concat(A.AUC_DEPT_NAME , ' / ' , A.AUC_USER_NAME) AUC_USER FROM RFID_APPR_USERCNG A INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_RQST B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY RQSTNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_APPR_USERCNG A INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_RQST B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO WHERE 1=1

SELECT A.RQSTNO, A.AUC_USER_NO, A.AUC_USER_NAME, A.AUC_DEPT_NO, A.AUC_DEPT_NAME, A.AUC_COMP_DT, A.REASON, B.RQST_REGTIME, B.RQST_USER_NO, B.RQST_USER_NAME, B.RQST_DEPT_NO, B.RQST_DEPT_NAME, B.RQST_ASSET_CNT, B.RQST_STATUS_CD, FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM008', B.RQST_STATUS_CD) RQST_STATUS_NAME, B.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, B.FRST_REGISTER_ID, B.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, B.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, concat(B.RQST_DEPT_NAME , ' / ' , B.RQST_USER_NAME) RQST_USER, concat(A.AUC_DEPT_NAME , ' / ' , A.AUC_USER_NAME) AUC_USER, D.ASSET_SEQ, D.ASSET_NO, D.ASSET_NAME, D.ITEM_CD, D.ITEM_NAME FROM RFID_APPR_USERCNG A INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_RQST B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_ASSET C ON A.RQSTNO = C.RQSTNO INNER JOIN RFID_ASSET D ON C.ASSET_SEQ = D.ASSET_SEQ WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY RQSTNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_APPR_USERCNG A INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_RQST B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO WHERE 1=1

SELECT A.RQSTNO, A.AUC_USER_NO, A.AUC_USER_NAME, A.AUC_DEPT_NO, A.AUC_DEPT_NAME, A.AUC_COMP_DT, A.REASON, B.RQST_REGTIME, B.RQST_USER_NO, B.RQST_USER_NAME, B.RQST_DEPT_NO, B.RQST_DEPT_NAME, B.RQST_ASSET_CNT, B.RQST_STATUS_CD, FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM008', B.RQST_STATUS_CD) RQST_STATUS_NAME, B.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, B.FRST_REGISTER_ID, B.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, B.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, concat(B.RQST_DEPT_NAME , ' / ' , B.RQST_USER_NAME) RQST_USER, concat(A.AUC_DEPT_NAME , ' / ' , A.AUC_USER_NAME) AUC_USER FROM RFID_APPR_USERCNG A INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_RQST B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO WHERE A.RQSTNO = #{rqstno}
